1224190.name: Wanderlust: Travel Stories Soundtrack
1224190.description:
Close your eyes and let the music carry you to distant places. The original score for Wanderlust: Travel Stories is more than 70 minutes of beautiful instrumental compositions.

Taking inspiration from music styles from around the world, four distinct composers take you on a one-in-a-kind journey. Their tunes are melodic illustrations of various thoughts and moods that may accompany you in travels to distant places. From hope to nostalgia, from happiness to sorrow--immerse yourself in the world of emotions.

Available in MP3 and FLAC.

Composers:

  • Tomasz Kuczma (tracks 20, 21)
  • Robert Purzycki (tracks 13-19, 22)
  • Patryk Scelina (tracks 1, 2, 8-12, 23)
  • Igor Szulc (tracks 3-7)
